docs.snippet: The signing of the treaty of peace and friendship by Bolivia and Paraguay here on Thursday after three years of difficult diplomatic negotiations terminated the longstanding Chaco dispute, which has been the most dangerous of South America's several...
docs.lead_paragraph: The signing of the treaty of peace and friendship by Bolivia and Paraguay here on Thursday after three years of difficult diplomatic negotiations terminated the longstanding Chaco dispute, which has been the most dangerous of South America's several troublesome border conflicts.

headline.main: CHACO PACT SETS PRECEDENT; Termination of Conflict by Arbitration Is a Triumph for Secretary Hull's Policy BOTH SIDES LOST THE WAR' Possible to Stop a War" More Arbitration Ahead Free Port for Bolivia

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITESpecial Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

headline.main: SHIPPING AND MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN DAYLIGHT-SAVING TIME

docs.snippet: Thomas H. Bevan of Baltimore, American Consul General at Warsaw, died here this morning following a kidney attack on Thursday while returning to his post from a vacation. His age was 51.
docs.lead_paragraph: Thomas H. Bevan of Baltimore, American Consul General at Warsaw, died here this morning following a kidney attack on Thursday while returning to his post from a vacation. His age was 51.

headline.main: T. H. BEVAN IS DEAD; CONSUL IN WARSAW; Chief of American Consulate Stricken in Berlin While Returning From Leave WAS IN SERVICE 25 YEARS Stationed in Norway, Germany and Many Other Posts--He Was a Baltimorean

docs.snippet: The Argentine Boxing Federation announced today that the Amateur Athletic Union of the United States had agreed to send a team of boxers to Argentina in October to compete in the Pan-American championships.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Argentine Boxing Federation announced today that the Amateur Athletic Union of the United States had agreed to send a team of boxers to Argentina in October to compete in the Pan-American championships.
docs.abstract: AAU plans to send team to Argentina for Pan-Amer champs

headline.main: TO BOX IN ARGENTINA; A. A. U. Plans to Send Team for Title Bouts in October

docs.snippet: Governor Lehman was announced yesterday as one of a number of public officials who will serve on the reception committee to greet delegates to the second World Youth Congress, to be held Aug. 16 to 24 at Vassar College, Poughkeepsie. The...
docs.lead_paragraph: Governor Lehman was announced yesterday as one of a number of public officials who will serve on the reception committee to greet delegates to the second World Youth Congress, to be held Aug. 16 to 24 at Vassar College, Poughkeepsie. The representatives of Chile, China, Argentina, Uruguay, Africa and the Near East are already on their way to New York.
docs.abstract: On reception com to greet World Youth Cong delegates

headline.main: LEHMAN TO GREET YOUTH; Named on Reception Group for Second World Congress
